 var variablesObj = {};

 for (i = 0; i < itemJson.variables.length; i++) {
 variablesObj[itemJson.variables[i].name] = itemJson.variables[i].value;
 if (itemJson.variables[i].type === 33)
 attachmentIds.push(itemJson.variables[i].value);
 }
 

 var reqObj = {
 "sysparm_id" : itemJson.sys_id,
 "variables" : variablesObj
 };
 cartObj.addToCart(reqObj);
 var requestResponse = cartObj.checkoutCart(true);
 var requestGr = new GlideRecord('sc_request');
 if (requestGr.get(requestResponse.request_id)) {
 var reqItemGr = new GlideRecord('sc_req_item');
 reqItemGr.addQuery("request", requestResponse.request_id);
 reqItemGr.query();
 if (reqItemGr.next()) {
 vaVars.record_id = reqItemGr.getUniqueValue();
 vaVars.record_table = 'sc_req_item';
 // add attachment to record
 var mediaLinksFormAttachment = vaVars.media_links_form_attachment.split(',');
 for (var i in mediaLinksFormAttachment)
 vaSystem.attachToRecord(mediaLinksFormAttachment[i], vaVars.record_table, vaVars.record_id);

 }
 // move attachment variable to record
 var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_attachment');
 gr.addQuery('sys_id', 'IN' , attachmentIds);
 gr.query();
 while (gr.next()) {
 gr.setValue('table_name', 'ZZ_YY' + vaVars.record_table);
 gr.setValue('table_sys_id', vaVars.record_id);
 gr.update();
 }
 }
